metadata.title: CVE-2019-2136 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Status::readFromParcel of Status.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds read due to improper input validation. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-132650049.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-native package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
